main_definition: The most remote or earliest in time, place, degree, importance, etc.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Occurring at the very beginning of a period of time
meanings_and_examples.example: The earliest signs of spring are when we see crocus flowers blooming.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The first or most prominent in order, rank, or degree; preceding all others
meanings_and_examples.example: She was the earliest person to apply for a job at the company.

meanings_and_examples.definition: With regard to an event that happened before any other similar events
meanings_and_examples.example: This is the earliest known case of its kind in medical history.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The first or most primitive stage of development of something
meanings_and_examples.example: They discovered the earliest human settlements from thousands of years ago.
